metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20030 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An error when processing the EXIF_IFD_INTEROPERABILITY and EXIF_IFD_EXIF tags within libexif version 0.6.21 can be exploited to exhaust available CPU resources.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20030` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-2ubuntu0.2').
